productText.text: Enjoy sweet, vine-ripened tomato taste with flavorful herbs and seasonings
productText.textHTML: Enjoy sweet, vine-ripened tomato taste with flavorful herbs and seasonings

productText.text: Each ½-cup serving provides 40% of your daily vegetables
productText.textHTML: Each ½-cup serving provides 40% of your daily vegetables

productText.text: Use as an ingredient or shortcut for dishes your family will love
productText.textHTML: Use as an ingredient or shortcut for dishes your family will love

productText.text: Prego® Heart Smart™ Traditional Italian Sauce gives you the flavor of vine-ripened tomatoes balanced with savory seasonings. Plus, it’s certified by the American Heart Association.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Heart Smart™ Traditional Italian Sauce gives you the flavor of vine-ripened tomatoes balanced with savory seasonings. Plus, it’s certified by the American Heart Association.

productText.text: Prego® Heart Smart™ Traditional Italian Sauce gives you all the rich, sweet flavor of vine-ripened tomatoes balanced with savory herbs and seasonings. Plus, it’s certified by the American Heart Association. Perfect as is or use it as a base for your own pasta sauce.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Heart Smart™ Traditional Italian Sauce gives you all the rich, sweet flavor of vine-ripened tomatoes balanced with savory herbs and seasonings. Plus, it’s certified by the American Heart Association. Perfect as is or use it as a base for your own pasta sauce.

productText.text: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
productText.textHTML: Prego® Italian sauces are made with sweet vine-ripened tomatoes and savory herbs and seasonings you can taste in every bite. Whether you’re in the mood for a zesty tomato sauce or a rich, creamy Alfredo sauce—Prego brings irresistible taste your whole family will love.
